goal: What can you rinse the yoga mat in to ensure it's clean and to prevent it from being slippery? [SEP] solution 1Rinse the yoga mat in in used bath water to make sure it's clean and to prevent it from being slippery. [SEP] solution 2Rinse the yoga mat in clean water to make sure it's clean and to prevent it from being slippery
